scalar:array.comment: /** * Get meta tags for a given page * * @since 1.5.0 * @param int $id_lang * @param string $page_name * @return array Meta tags */

/** * Get manufacturer meta tags * * @since 1.5.0 * @param int $id_manufacturer * @param int $id_lang * @param string $page_name * @return array */
